metadata.title: CVE-2018-5146 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An out of bounds memory write while processing Vorbis audio data wasreported through the Pwn2Own contest. This vulnerability affects Firefox <59.0.1, Firefox ESR < 52.7.2, and Thunderbird < 52.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-testsuite - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libvorbis0a - 1.3.5-4.2
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.5-4.2
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.5-4.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:52.7.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
libvorbis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-4.2').
